name: Bullets of Jahanam
description:
A game where you are being bombarded with bullets in which you have to try and avoid them.

Each attack has a unique pattern that has to be learned in order to master it, with events that can change these patterns or force you to get out of your comfort zone.

Controls

Movement: WASD
Slow down player: Space
Slow down bullets: LShift

Credits

Programmer, artist, and designer: Zeperox
Music: Cthethan
Special Thanks: Fade_X, The Snail, K.., and wing8978

Notes

Your anti-virus might say this game is a trojan, which is not. Idk why antiviruses hate EXE files created from python, so just report it as a false-positive.
